channel.title: [317 DELTA] Adding new character models. Rep++
channel.description:
[center]Any idea on how I can add the newest character models to my 317 DELTA client?
Right now their the OLDSCHOOL straight 317 character models.
Here's what I have now: [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2epts8p.png[/img]
I want to update them so they look newer like this: [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/4rxqn8.png[/img][/center]
I have a link for the newer 662 Character Models but i added them and it did not update the character models.
[u]I'm not sure of my current models I have for the character so I can replace them myself if someone can tell me where to look to edit the character models.[/u]
I will rep++ for any help I can get to adding these models.

item.title: [317 DELTA] Adding new character models. Rep++
item.dc:creator: @JGX JGX
item.description:
@JGX wrote:

Just put the .dat files into the “model” folder.

Read full topic
item.source: [317 DELTA] Adding new character models. Rep++

item.title: [317 DELTA] Adding new character models. Rep++

item.description:
@iBunnie wrote:

did you cache pack them or just put the .dat files into the raw folder
